Fenced, cross fenced, treed with multiple pastures and a cattle guard at the front and rear of the property. Yearly oil revenue of over $10,000 with limitless possibilities. Abundant with moose, elk, mule, white tail deer, wolf, coyote, lynx, you name it! Plenty of water throughout as the creek runs through the property, a beaver dam provides a great pond - great for livestock, or recreation - make your dream a reality!
Realtor Remarks: Buyers agent must first physically  introduce the buyer to the property, in person, otherwise the commission will be $500.00.
